title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4226.6 - Horse led to the post
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4226.6 - Horse led to the post

State Regulations

When, by permission of the paddock judge and upon payment
to the association of $10, a horse is led to the post, he is excused from
parading with the other horses, but nevertheless he must, on his way to the
post, pass the judges' stand. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4226.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
